TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridViewTextBoxCell extends System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell

summary.span: 显示 控件中的可编辑文本信息。

span.span: Displays editable text information in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是种特殊的类型的用于显示可编辑基于文本的信息的单个字符串。The class is a specialized type of used to display a single string of editable text-based information. 当前所选主机控制用户可以在其中编辑单元格的值 (假设的属性设置为`false`)。The currently selected hosts a control in which the user can edit the cell's value (assuming the property of the is set to `false`). 列类型专用于保存此类型的单元格。The is the column type specialized to hold cells of this type. 默认情况下函数将初始化为一个新。By default, the is initialized to a new . 若要在列内的单元格模式的现有后，设置该列的属性设置为要用作一种模式的单元格。To pattern the cells within a column after an existing , set the column's property to the cell to use as a pattern. 列的单元格相关的属性都是相似的属性的模板单元格的包装。The cell-related properties of the column are wrappers for the similarly-named properties of the template cell. 更改模板单元格的属性值将只影响单元格基于模板在更改后添加。Changing the property values of the template cell will affect only cells based on the template that are added after the change. 更改列的单元格相关属性值，但是，将更新模板单元格和列中的所有其他单元格，如有必要刷新列显示。Changing the cell-related property values of the column, however, will update the template cell and all other cells in the column, and refresh the column display if necessary. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用作为模板。The following code example demonstrates how to use a as a template for a . 对列中的任何单元格所做的样式更改会影响所有列的单元格。Style changes made to any cell in the column affect all of the column's cells. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#120](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CPP/DataGridViewColumnDemo.cpp#120)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#120](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CS/DataGridViewColumnDemo.cs#120)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#120](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/VB/datagridviewcolumndemo.vb#120)]

span.para: 派生自并将新属性添加到派生类，请确保重写方法以在克隆操作过程中复制新属性。此外应调用基类的方法，以便基类的属性复制到新的单元格。

When you derive from and add new properties to the derived class, be sure to override the method to copy the new properties during cloning operations. You should also call the base class's method so that the properties of the base class are copied to the new cell.

span.span: Creates an exact copy of this cell.
An that represents the cloned .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重写方法时从派生并将新属性添加到派生的类。Override the method whenever you derive from and add new properties to the derived class.

span.para: 重写时派生类中调用基类的方法，以便基类的属性复制到新的单元格，并确保也将复制的派生类中添加的任何属性的值。

When overriding in a derived class, call the base class's method so that the properties of the base class are copied to the new cell, and be sure to also copy the values of any properties that were added to the derived class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的对象`CreateAccessibilityInstance`方法支持 [UI 自动化](~/docs/framework/ui-automation/ui-automation-overview.md)仅在开始使用.NET 的.NET framework 目标版本重新编译的应用程序中的属性Framework 4.7.2。The object returned by the `CreateAccessibilityInstance` method supports the [UI Automation](~/docs/framework/ui-automation/ui-automation-overview.md) property only in applications that are recompiled to target versions of the .NET Framework starting with the .NET Framework 4.7.2. 面向.NET Framework 的早期版本，但在.NET Framework 4.7.2 上运行应用程序可以选择启用此功能通过兼容性开关。Applications that target an earlier version of the .NET Framework but are running on the .NET Framework 4.7.2 can opt in to this feature by using a compatibility switch. 有关其他信息，请参阅[What's New in.NET Framework 中辅助功能](~/docs/framework/whats-new/whats-new-in-accessibility.md)。For additional information, see [What's New in Accessibility in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/whats-new/whats-new-in-accessibility.md).

summary.span: 获取与该单元格关联的格式化值的类型。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基础的格式化值的类型始终是因为文本框中仅处理文本信息The type of the underlying formatted value is always because a text box only handles text information ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来确定单元格内容的类型。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine the type of the cell contents. 在此示例中，使用属性来确定该单元格是否包含然后再尝试将值转换。In this example, the property is used to determine whether the cell contains a before attempting to convert the value. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例中提供事件。This example is part of a larger example available in the event. param.name: e
param.span: 一个 ，表示按下的键。

span.span: A that represents the key that was pressed.

summary.span: 确定是否应基于给定键启动编辑模式。

span.span: Determines if edit mode should be started based on the given key.

returns.span: 如果应启动编辑模式，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if edit mode should be started; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当的属性控件设置为或，该控件使用此方法来确定是否以外，此单元格获得焦点时由用户按下 F2 键将导致单元格进入编辑模式。When the property of the control is set to or , the control uses this method to determine whether a key other than F2 that is pressed by the user while this cell has focus will cause the cell to enter edit mode. 此方法返回`true`e 参数指示普通的数据输入密钥 （如字母、 数字、 标点符号或 SPACE 键） 以未修改形式按 ALT 或 CTRL，如果不包括按 SHIFT + 空格键，由该控件用于选择目的。This method returns `true` if the e parameter indicates an ordinary data-entry key (such as a letter, number, punctuation mark, or the SPACE key) unmodified by ALT or CTRL, excluding SHIFT+SPACE, which is used by the control for selection purposes. 有关详细信息，请参阅[默认键盘和鼠标处理 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/default-keyboard-and-mouse-handling-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Default Keyboard and Mouse Handling in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/default-keyboard-and-mouse-handling-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

summary.span: 获取或设置可以在文本框中输入的最大字符数。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of characters that can be entered into the text box.

value.span: 可以在文本框中输入的最大字符数，默认值是 32767。

span.span: The maximum number of characters that can be entered into the text box; the default value is 32767.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性不会影响输入以编程方式通过单元格的值或单元格格式设置的文本的长度。The property does not affect the length of text entered programmatically through the cell's value or through cell formatting. 它只影响哪些用户可以输入和编辑。It affects only what the user can input and edit. 设置所属列的属性还会设置属性列中每个单元格。Setting the property of the owning column also sets the property of every cell in the column. 若要重写每个单元格的指定的值，设置单元格的值后设置列的值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.

span.span: The value is less than 0.
